name: Catstronauts (ruzihm, SteelBandit, Tsutsayosdi, yokaiy)
description:
Catstronauts (ruzihm, SteelBandit, Tsutsayosdi, yokaiy) is a platformer game developed by yokaiy, ruzihm and SteelBandit. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Catstronauts (ruzihm, SteelBandit, Tsutsayosdi, yokaiy) on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
